moves.1. e4:
Oh SQUEAK.

Didn't deserve to win this one, had to attack my way out of trouble.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 h6 4. d4 exd4: Not convinced about that one. I didn't want to take the knight, so I was deffing, but obviously blocking development of queen and bishop.
moves.6. Qf3 f6: Can't take the freebie cos of the mate in one.
moves.8. Qd3 Nec6 9. c3 Ne6: Quite happy to transfer the d pawn over to e
moves.10. Qg3 Qe7 11. Nd2 d6 12. Nf3 Ng5: Again quite happy to try and move the h pawn to g and free up my rook
moves.13. Nd4 Nxd4 14. cxd4 Bd7: I wanted to take the e pawn but I saw bad things happening with R-e1 pinning the knight, so I'm moving stuff out of the way first.
moves.15. Re1 O-O-O 16. f3 b5 17. Bd3 c6 18. b: This was in preparation for d5, to try and get into his back sectors.
moves.19. a4 d5 20. axb5 Qxb4 21. Ba3: That looked very speculative at the time and I still think it was a mistake on his part. But it does lead to a good situation.... for him.
moves.22. Kh1 Qxd3: ...and loses the bishop. 7 points up, well in control...everything good....
moves.23. Bxf8 Rhxf8: Don't mind swapping pieces with my material advantage.
moves.24. Rxa7: And then I realise I'm in trouble.
moves.24... Ne6: I looked at several alternatives. In the end this seemed to be the best...
moves.25. b6: Now my opponent is making full use of my queenside weakness.
moves.25... Kd8 26. b7 Ke7 27. Rea1 dxe4: This wasn't so much an attacking move, more trying to find a way for my queen to get back.
moves.30. Qe1 Qd2 31. Qb1: At this point I was ready to resign, but I thought I'd just play one more move.
moves.31... Nf4: And how critical it turned out.
moves.32. Rxe8+ Rxe8 33. Qg1: And with that move I start to see a glimmer of hope.
moves.33... Rb8: First objective of course is to stop that pawn. If that queens then I'm still in bother.
moves.34. Rb1: Perhaps a weak move, allowing me the initiative.
moves.35. Rd1 Qf2 36. Qxf2 exf2 37. Rf1 Nd3: And now the game has swung back completely. The sole threat the b2 pawn which I should be able to cope with. He can attack the knight but thats easily defensible or even sackable.
moves.38... Bxh3: And there he decides he has had enough. But #24 took several years off my life!
